name: I Wanna Be A Racing Game
name_original: I Wanna Be A Racing Game
description:
I Wanna Be A Racing Game is a platformer, local-multiplayer, racing extravaganza. It was made for Games Fleadh 2017 and won an award for "Best in Game Design".

Credits:

Alex McAllister

Eoghain McGrath

Luke O Brien

Nathan Dunne

Gamepad Controls: 
A to join 
A to select 
B to leave 
Y to Taunt 
Left-Stick Move
A to Jump

Keyboard Controls: 

Player One
"A & D" movement 
"Space" Jump 
"Space" Select 
"E" to taunt
 
Player Two
"Arrow Keys" movement 
"Keypad 0" Jump 
"Keypad 0" Select
"Keypad 1" to taunt

"Enter" Full screen

"Esc" Exit full screen

Please download the game if you'd like score tracking to be enabled.
